document.full_text: the parents of a 13-year-old girl who hanged herself in 2009 after being ridiculed by classmates for texting a suggestive photo of herself to a boy have sued the school district.
document.title: parents sue school district after teen daughter's suicide
lines_and_colors: the parents of a 13-year-old girl who hanged herself in 2009 after being ridiculed by classmates for texting a suggestive photo of herself to a boy have sued the school district.
